name: Efflorescence of Lust
description:
Efflorescence of Lust is a combination of puzzle and clicker games.
It helps enhance your agility and reaction capability.
It can also help you get a relief from anxiety by playing it.

Features:
1. The game contents are rich, there are 2 games you can play with.
2. Creative jigsaw puzzle game consisting of 7 stages.
3. Fascinating clicker game consisting of 5 stages with attractive anime girl in each.
4. Amazing anime girl animations!
5. Nice musics!
6. High resolution images and animations!

DLC Content & Install Method:
The game features DLC which allows you to have additional contents.
Hold Win+R to start Run, then type "steam://install/1234740" or "steam://rungameid/1234740", press Enter at last. The DLC will be installed.
After installing the DLC, view mode for Click Game will be unlocked, and you will be able to see incredible contents.

Community:
If you have doubts in the game, please contact us.
